item.title: IF CRISIS OR WAR COMES (Sweden) - digital version
item.description: Advice for private individuals https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/ Prepare for crisis https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/forbered-dig-for-kris/ Advice on attacks with deadly force https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/rad-vid-pagaende-dodligt-vald/ Fire safety in the home https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/brandsakerhet-i-hemmet/ Fireworks https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/fyrverkerier/ Natural disasters https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/naturolyckor/ Fire safety in forest and land https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/brandsakerhet-i-skog-och-mark/ Information security https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/informationssakerhet/ The brochure If the crisis or the war is coming https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/broschyren-om-krisen-eller-kriget-kommer/ Gasol at home and in leisure time https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/gasol-hemma/ Children and risks https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/barn-och-risker/ Communicate in case of accident and crisis https://www.msb.se/sv/rad-till-privatpersoner/kommunicera-vid-olycka-och-kris/ Other useful guide

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy AppPlay Software built the AppPlay Software app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by AppPlay Software at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service. If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy.

item.title: Terms Of Use
item.description: TERMS OF USE Last updated September 25, 2020 AGREEMENT TO OUR LEGAL TERMS We are Software Play Store ("Company," “we,” “us,” “our”), a private software developer mainly develope android application in Sweden. We operate the website https://autotechnavi.com/ (the “Site”), the mobile application Android App (the “App”), as well as any other related products and services that refer or link to these legal terms (the “Legal Terms”) (collectively, the “Services”). We provide an application platform that you can use to travel around the world and add more information for your personal use.

item.title: All Swedish Apps You Must Have
item.description: Must Know Swedish Verbs List Must Know Swedish Verbs List Including 4 types for each verbs, realtime search and direct popup in SAOL. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.app.sfiverb SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER All aspects of Swedish for beginners including grammars, vocabulary, pronounciations, and more … https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.swedish.swedishforbeginnersSFI Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autotechnavi.app.rivstartwordlist A useful dictionary of Rivstart book when you are using it. item.title: Useful Resources and Links for Swedish Learners
item.description: Resources Android apps Digital lexicons & dictionaries Vocabulary and lists Corpus tools Podcasts Youtube Online courses Websites Communities Blogs Digital books Physical books Smartphone apps Online bookstores News outlets Television Radio Resources Here follows an index of useful resources that might help you on your way to mastering Swedish. Android apps Must Known Swedish Verbs List SFB-SWEDISH FOR BEGINNER Wordlist Rivstart A1+A2 Digital lexicons & dictionaries Svenska.se Three official monolingual Swedish dictionaries in one website: use SAOL for spelling and inflections, and SO for definitions, pronunciations and etymology.

item.title: Kotlin Var vs Val
item.description: var val Ref. type Can only be assigned once, Read Only Can be assigned & changed multiple times, Mutable Example val i = 100 var i = 100 Characteristics (1) Must be initialized (2) Value cannot be changed or reassign (1) Can initialize later by using lateinit (2) Value can be changed or reassign but not in global scope Use Cases Create variables that should not be accidentally modified, or property remain unchanged Property will vary in time

item.title: Kotlin vs Java the Key Kotlin Benefits for Developers
item.description: Kotlin & its history Kotlin vs Java - The key Kotlin benefits for developers It’s fast and concise It’s safe with null safety Simple extension functions It simplifies the creation of data classes It handles casts automatically, in a ‘smart’ way It’s very flexible, with the ability to carry out both object oriented and functional programming Setup Kotlin development environment Install VSCode Setup VSCode extensions & plugins for Kotlin development DL&install Kotlin command-line compiler Setup runtime environment for Kotlin compiler Test the Hello World project fun main(){ println("Hello, let's have fun 15 mins with Kotlin") }
